alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 29 at 3:52AM EDT until October 30 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Eastern Essex MA, Southeast Middlesex MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA, Southern Bristol MA and Southern Plymouth MA Counties. In Rhode Island, Eastern Kent RI and Washington RI Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth
